attributes.action: order a high court review of the legality of the British National Party policies and ethics and offer a vote to the general public of the United Kingdom to whether or not it feels the BNP should be classed as a political party with the countries well-being as its primary interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for the Prime Minister to order a high court review of the legality of the British National Party as a political party including scrutiny over its ethics and policies. Also allowing a public vote to whether or not the British Public feel that the BNP is a genuine political party with the interests of Great Britain and its inhabitants at heart.
